result.execSummary:
The defendant Riza I Mahmoud was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: Court will allow probation to be terminated after 6 months if all conditions are met.

miscConds.notes: Pay all costs and surcharges or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Riza I Mahmoud

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 24.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
JusticePoint VIOLATION REPORT (missed office contact on 7-9-15), received and filed.

Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a final pretrial and jury trial date in Branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State does not have their file.  Status conference scheduled for May 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has not retained counsel.  Court allows for an adjournment to allow for defendant to obtain counsel.  Status conference scheduled for May 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant requests time to obtain counsel.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Defendant Riza I Mahmoud in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge PROTASIEWICZ.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.  Defendant entered a plea of not guilty.  DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  Case is adjourned for pretrial in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
